dcterms:creator: Andrea Dal Pozzolo
Olivier Caelen
Reid A Johnson
Gianluca Bontempi
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 284,807 transactions and 31 features, including 492 fraud transactions, making it highly imbalanced (0.172%). The numerical features are the result of PCA transformation for confidentiality and privacy reasons, along with time and amount columns.
dcterms:title: European card data (ECD)

dcterms:creator: Fabrizio Angiulli
Clara Pizzuti
dcterms:description: This dataset contains real-world e-commerce transactions with a variety of numerical and categorical features, totaling 590,540 transactions, of which 20,663 are fraud transactions, resulting in a class imbalance ratio of roughly 3.5%. It also includes time and amount columns.
dcterms:title: IEEE-CIS fraud dataset (IEEE)
